name: Advent of Code Day 1
description: Solution for advent of code Day 1, tasks 1 and 2.

name: 10 highest numbers
description: Loop through an array to find ten highest values in it.

name: Python bingo
description: This program reads a file, first row being a call of winning numbers. Then a list of 5x5 bingo boards, separated by one empty line. The program goes through every board marking each called number with an X. Then the program goes through each board and marks the board that wins LAST.

name: Diskount basket
description: Program gets an array of items in a shopping basket. Then calculates total amount for buy 3 pay for 2. Purchases of over 100 result in a free shipping.
